title: Truck License — Study Guide
description: Heavy vehicle safety, fatigue, loading and speed rules for the Voxel test.

items.question: Which of the following should you NOT do if you experience a tire failure?
items.explanation: Do not slam the brakes. Ease off and control the vehicle safely.

items.question: Flags or lights are required on projecting loads that extend
items.explanation: Loads extending 1.2m or more must be marked clearly.

items.question: What is the maximum ammount of hours you can work for?
items.explanation: Truck drivers may drive up to 12 hours with mandatory rests.

items.question: To help you stay alert and safe while driving, you should
items.explanation: Avoid drowsiness-causing medication. Fatigue is a major risk.

items.question: What is the maximum speed limit for heavy vehicles over 4.5 tonnes GVM?
items.explanation: Heavy vehicles are restricted to 100km/h for safety.
